name: Drifter's Juke
summary: You move in and out of range to complement your attacks.
description:
You move in and out of range to complement your attacks. You Step, make a Strike, Step, and make another Strike. One Strike must be a ranged Strike using your firearm or crossbow, and the other must be a melee Strike using your melee weapon or unarmed attack. You can choose not to take one or both Steps.Traits

Flourish: Flourish actions are actions that require too much exertion to perform a large number in a row. You can use only 1 action with the flourish trait per turn.
